[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [icons](./blockly.icons_namespace.md) &gt; [Icon](./blockly.icons_namespace.icon_class.md)

## icons.Icon class

The abstract icon class. Icons are visual elements that live in the top-start corner of the block. Usually they provide more "meta" information about a block (such as warnings or comments) as opposed to fields, which provide "actual" information, related to how a block functions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class Icon implements IIcon 
```
**Implements:** [IIcon](./blockly.iicon_interface.md)

|  [tooltip](./blockly.icons_namespace.icon_class.tooltip_property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [tooltip.TipInfo](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.tipinfo_typealias.md) | The tooltip for this icon. |
